Reviews.Title: “Nice big quiet hotel”
Reviews.Author: GRE95
Reviews.Content: time stayed hotel nice quiet city cars drive past window clubs nearby disturb sleep staff friendly reception staff speak english hotel self contained flat microwave hob etc cant comment breakfast served usually cook goto resturants city apartment 3 bedrooms person tv 400 channels channel hoping lol 3 channels english rest turkish arabic dont holiday watch tv trams buses taxis short walk resturants shopping centre enjoy stay

Reviews.Title: “Alternative lodging in istanbul”
Reviews.Author: luv2travel16
Reviews.Content: chose hotel proximity airport little worried cab driver hotel located finally arrived hotel impressed size roomwell actually apartment 3 bedrooms kitchen 2 baths able night sleep flight advantage complimentary breakfast rated 4 stars disappointed service lack service usually front desk figure own cab airport cab stand street hotel option space near airport recommend close main attractions

Reviews.Title: “Excelllence”
Reviews.Author: Andrei85
Reviews.Content: supposed stay night disappointing stay hotel ive stayed turkey prime location city expected wish granted flats impressively decorated pretty classy excellent looking bedroom pleasure sleep view city spacious comfortable
